website_summaries.verdict: An empowering and inspirational option. The perfect Barbie for little girls with big aspirations.
pros: Allows little ones to adopt the role of a caretaker, encouraging compassionate and nurturing behavior
Features loads of realistic extras for imaginative and convincing play
cons: Small parts can be a little difficult to keep track of and may pose a choking hazard

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable set. My daughter will be excited to finally have African-American babies to play along with her other African-American dolls and the set really is adorable. I bought the "used" option from the Amazon Warehouse deals, which was much cheaper, and there was only slight damage to the packaging that isn't all that noticeable and is the type of damage items are prone to during shipping so it was a great deal. I recommend checking to see if there are "used" Amazon Warehouse deals on the items you buy so you can buy them much cheaper, because this is my second time buying an item with that method and the "damage" on both items was barely any damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: because the cart is not sturdy and keeps tipping over
customer_reviews.text: This set has gotten more playtime than the average toy. I am giving it 3 stars, however, because the cart is not sturdy and keeps tipping over. My daughter has to prop it against the wall to play with it. The baby beds do not clip in well to the cart either so they slip off easily. This set is probably less frustrating for a child 5 and over.
customer_reviews.author: ck0987

customer_reviews.title: She is African American
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this doll thinking she would be anglo/brunette. I was surprised to find she is African American, but no worries. I love the multicultural Barbies and am thrilled to give this lovely doll to my granddaughter. Her mother's OB/GYN is an African-American Doctor, so this doll is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Trumpets

customer_reviews.title: She’s loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is wanting to become a pediatrician when she grows up. Being half African American, it’s hard to find dolls that look similar to her. When she opened this up she screamed with joy!!! She loved seeing a Barbie that looks like her and is a pediatrician!

product_meta.title: Barbie Careers Baby Doctor Doll Playset, Brunette
product_meta.description: Explore the world of medicine with Barbie dolls and medical play sets! Barbie baby doctor doll is ready to see patients with furniture for an exam table and accessories to care for two adorable babies. Details are realistic with colorful touches and office-inspired elements. Teal scrubs and white shoes are a perfect professional look. Barbie baby doctor doll does double duty with an exam station that features two tubs, a moving mobile and storage space. Accessories let young minds care for baby patients with a stethoscope, two baby towels, a bottle and a medical chart. Young doctors will love giving their patients a clean bill of health with baby doctor Barbie doll. Explore all the Barbie career dolls because with Barbie, you can be anything (each sold separately, subject to availability). Includes Barbie baby doctor doll wearing career-themed outfit and accessories, office set, themed pieces and two patients. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Explore the world of medicine with these Barbie doll and medical play sets!
Choose from specialties that include zoo doctor, baby doctor or dentist
Each comes with an exam station that has fun features
Includes a career-ready outfit, along an adorable patient (or two)
Girls will love exploring the field of medicine

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,110 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
